trans-unit.source: Weight of the World (6+ Intellect points) #Ability #SpecialAttackAbility #High #Core
trans-unit.target: Weight of the World (6+ Intellect points) #Ability #SpecialAttackAbility #High #Core

trans-unit.source: You can increase a target’s weight dramatically. The target is pulled to the ground and can’t move physically under its own power for one minute. The target must be within short range. In addition to the normal options for using Effort, you can choose to use Effort to affect additional creatures (one per level of Effort).
trans-unit.target: You can increase a target’s weight dramatically. The target is pulled to the ground and can’t move physically under its own power for one minute. The target must be within short range. In addition to the normal options for using Effort, you can choose to use Effort to affect additional creatures (one per level of Effort).
